abstract: So-called man bun, once cutting-edge style in which men wore their hair on top of their head, has now become mainstream; excerpts from interviews with several men in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, who talk about their own.
lead_paragraph: The hairstyle, which used to bestow a certain cachet, is now mainstream, and some are calling for its wearers to “liberate their locks.”

headline.main: Man Buns Are Holding On in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Man Buns Are Holding On in Brooklyn

snippet: The hairstyle, which used to bestow a certain cachet, is now mainstream, and some are calling for its wearers to “liberate their locks.”
